name: FX Currency Tables
author: Andy Stevenson

sections.installation:
1. Upload fx-currency-tables folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Settings -> Currency Table
  4. Select up to 6 currencies
  5. Use shortcode [currency_table] to publish horizontal table as part of a post or a page.
  6. Use Appearance -> Widgets to publish “Currency table” widget.
sections.faq:
Can multiple instances of the widget be used?

Yes.
sections.description: FX-ForeignExchange 6 currency cross table plugin for WordPress. This easy to use tool adds a horizontal 6 currency table to posts and pages, and the widget adds a 3 column portrait table to sidebars. The 6 currencies can be selected by the user from a list of 3 over 180 worldwide. The rates are based on a 12 minute delay feed and are live ECB interbank rates. An ideal tool for forex, currency trading and commodities sites and a very attractive addition to any e-commerce site where buyers are likely to originate across more than one currency zone.
